title: Savage Attacker
content: aling crit damage with a longsword and using a Level 2 Smite (total of 8d8) would go from dealing 36 + STR to 46.4 + STR - This is excellent to get if you're using Smite a lot, and want to deal more damage. This feat works better for bigger dice than for smaller ones (e.g. d12 benefits more than d6). For an n-sided dice, the expected value of the maximum value of 2 throws is (n+1)(4n-1)/(6n).
